# slot-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                          | Type     | Default          |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------ | -------- | ---------------- |
| `fill`        | `fill`         | Fill color (default 'none')          | `string` | `'none'`         |
| `icon`        | `icon`         | The Icon name (default '')           | `string` | `''`             |
| `scale`       | `scale`        | Scale the icon size (default 1)      | `number` | `1`              |
| `stroke`      | `stroke`       | Stroke color (default 'currentColor) | `string` | `'currentColor'` |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | Stroke width (default 2)             | `string` | `'2'`            |
